output_data.clarification_question: What was the total time spent performing E/M and psychotherapy services during this session? (Total time includes counseling, coordination of care, and face-to-face time.)

primary_code.rationale: This code represents the most common follow-up service for established psychiatric patients, combining medication management (E/M component: Sertraline dose titration, symptom review, risk assessment) and psychotherapy elements (discussion of guilt, passive ideation, coping strategies). Actual code selection (90833, 90836, or 90838) requires precise time documentation.

output_data.medical_necessity: The patient is an established case presenting with significantly worsening *Major Depressive Disorder* (F33.1), requiring comprehensive risk assessment, safety planning, and complex medication management (titration of *Sertraline*).
